Class DataSourceCrawler

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class DataSourceCrawler
extends java.lang.Object
    Crawls the web site located at the input URL and returns the list of URLs present in that domain

    Puneet Ravuri

        Performs web crawling on the provided url and returns a map of schema element and their corresponding URLs
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Map of URLs in the domain
        Throws:
        GraphBuilderException - Thrown when there is any error during crawling

      • getLinks

        public void getLinks(java.lang.String url,
            java.lang.String fileName)
              throws GraphBuilderException
        Performs web crawling on the provided url and stores a map of schema element and their corresponding URLs in the file provided
        Parameters:
        url - Input URL that will be crawled
        fileName - Output file where the map contents will be written
        Throws:
        GraphBuilderException - Thrown when there is any error during crawling
